title: Naaman Is Healed
summary: Naaman, a Syrian commander with leprosy, seeks healing from Elisha. He is initially offended by Elisha’s simple instructions to wash in the Jordan but eventually obeys and is healed. Gehazi, Elisha’s servant, lies to get gifts from Naaman and is struck with leprosy.

faq.question: How was Naaman healed of leprosy?
faq.answer: By dipping seven times in the Jordan River, as Elisha instructed.

faq.question: Why was Gehazi punished?
faq.answer: Because he lied and took gifts in Elisha’s name, acting greedily and deceitfully.
